Buckets is an open Source CMS built on Node.js and MongoDB. It's currently under active development on Assembly

A new, simple way to manage content better.

Community Built

Buckets is an Assembly product. By contributing to Buckets development on Assembly, you can actually earn a portion of its profit. Get involved at Assembly.

Wicket Fast

Buckets has a fast, sleek, and responsive user interface. And additionally aims to provide extreme speed when querying for data.

They Hold Stuff

Whether you have press releases and training events or albums and bands, Buckets lets you store your content in an structured, but flexible, way.

For Web Designers

Buckets provides a simple approach to web publishing, allowing website creators to easily define routes and serve templates. These templates have powerful tags for pulling content from Buckets.

For Publishers

The Buckets admin interface allows content developers to add and manage content in the easiest, fastest way possible.

For Node.js Developers

As an NPM module. Buckets will allow fo developing great applications, and ca be used as Middleware in your app.
